name: Xenofeli Detective Agency
description:
Rei Knox, a 23 years old university graduate, was stranded in a small town of nowhere after he took the wrong bus on his solo traveling trip. Robbed of all of his possession, he was desperate to find a way to be back home, until he found a job vacancy flyer on the road as an temporary assistant. He followed the address on the flyer only to find a detective agency and its' strange owner.

Wait, detective agency, you said?! 

*Demo version only covers prologue

*background art by NoraNeko Games https://noranekogames.itch.io/

*musics by Tallbeard Studios https://tallbeard.itch.io/
